Current Deadline:
Game Over.

The Rules
1. All rules from this post apply here too.
2. Don't directly quote any game-related PMs I've sent you. Paraphrasing is OK.
3. Don't intentionally obfuscate your messages; cryptography, tiny text, and the like are not allowed.
4. Provable randomness, such as dice tags, is banned.
5. Treat your fellow users with respect. As a cool guy on this site once said, "Attack the play, not the player."
6. Don't pretend to be the mod. Green is my color. Please don't use it. Specifically [color=#00BF00]#00BF00 and #008000
7. Each in-game day will last 14 days and each in-game night will last two days.
8. I will prod players that haven't posted with game-advancing content for 48 hours. If a player is prodded and doesn't post within 24 hours of the prod, I will look for a replacement for that slot. I will replace a player if the player receives three prods. If you're in V/LA, you are exempt from the above rules for the duration of your V/LA. You must announce the V/LA either in-thread or in a PM to me.
9. If more than half of the live players vote for another player, they are lynched and removed from the game. After a lynching, all living players may post until the thread is locked: this time is called Twilight.
10. I will count votes if they are placed by the vote tag or in bold, and are recognizable as votes. Don't abuse this rule for trickery. Examples of these votes:
VOTE: eagerSnake
Vote: eagerSnake
11. If a player wants to end the day without a lynching, they may vote for "No Lynch." If a majority votes for No Lynch, the night will start early. If there is no majority vote by the deadline, no lynch will take place that Day.
12. Every player will have a Role, dictating what they can do during the night, if anything. Here's a sample PM for the role "Vanilla Townie."
Hello!

You are a Vanilla Townie.

Your powers include your voice and your vote! Use them well.

You win the game when all threats to the Town have been eliminated.

Confirm your role by replying to me with your Role and Alignment.

Good luck!

Game Thread

13. Players with roles and factional abilities, if any, can only choose one to use each night.
14. If you die, you are allowed one "Bah" post. You may not say anything game-related in it.
15. If you have any questions about these rules, PM me and I'll answer them.
And last but not least, don't forget to have fun!

Role PMs are out - the game will begin when 11/13 players confirm.

Players have until 11:59PM EST / Monday 5 December to confirm or until (expired on 2016-12-05 23:59:59).

So far, 11/13 players have confirmed.

Day 1 Begins

11/13 players have confirmed, Day 1 has started, and you may now post. With 13 alive, it takes 7 votes to lynch! The current deadline is 7:00PM EST Saturday, December 17, 2016, or (expired on 2016-12-17 19:00:00)

Trying to wrap my head around whether it is in town's best interests to lynch Gamma today or not.

Here are our options


1. Lynch Gamma today :: D4 = LYLO


2. If we don't lynch Gamma and we lynch town?
Lynch town w/N3 Gamma shoots mafia/N3 Gamma nk'd :: D4 = MYLO
Lynch town w/N3 Gamma shoots town/N3 Gamma nk'd :: D4 = Game Over Scum win
Lynch town w/N3 Gamma doesn't shoot/N3 Gamma nk'd :: D4 = LYLO
Lynch town w/N3 Gamma doesn't shoot and a VT is nk'd :: D4 = LYLO if Gamma is vig....total cluster if Gamma is SK.


3. If we don't lynch Gamma and we lynch mafia?

Lynch scum w/N3 Gamma shoots mafia :: D4 = Game Over Town win
Lynch scum w/N3 Gamma shoots town :: D4 = MYLO
Lynch scum w/N3 Gamma doesn't shoot and is NK'd :: D4 = MYLO - 1
Lynch scum w/N3 Gamma doesn't shoot and a VT is NK'd :: D4 = MYLO - 1 if Gamma is vig....MYLO if Gamma is SK.


This should point to allowing Gamma to live. The only two bad outcomes are within Scenario 2:

1) if we lynch town today and then Gamma shoots town N3 while at the same time being shot by scum. Then the game would be over. This option is eliminated if we lynch town and Gamma assures us he will not shoot at anything N3. It's in his best interests not to whether he is a vig or an SK.

2) if we lynch town today and then Gamma doesn't carry out a shot N3 AND scum shoot a VT instead of Gamma. IF Gamma were an SK this option would create all kinds of bad outcomes for any alignment. So it would not be in scum's best interests to target a VT instead of Gamma.

Trouble is if we don't do Scenario 1...we aren't sure what scenario we will get until the flip. Scenario 2 has obvious benefits and no real downfalls. And Scenario 2 (i.e. shit...we mislynched again) pretty much guarantees we get to D4 if Gamma doesn't shoot.


tl:dr;

I still think Gamma is best left spared today and see how tonight goes. If we lynch town by mistake...Gamma just has to assure us he won't shoot tonight.

Thoughts?

P.edit...Compulsive or not would obv matter.
